item.title: Take control of your notifications
item.description:
Interruptions are deadly. Well, maybe that's a little bit of exaggeration. But even three second interruptions can cause problems. I've decided to take back the notifications on my phone.

First stop was the phone ringer. Apple doesn't have a silent ringtone on the iPhone, so I had to search. In â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
